abstract: Colin Donnell, currently going toe-to-toe with Sutton Foster as her dapper leading man in "Anything Goes,'' will play the ambitious songwriter Franklin Shepard in the Encores! production of "Merrily We Roll Along,'' the show's creative team announced on Tuesday.
snippet: Colin Donnell, currently going toe-to-toe with Sutton Foster as her dapper leading man in "Anything Goes,'' will play the ambitious songwriter Franklin Shepard in the Encores! production of "Merrily We Roll Along,'' the show's creative team announced...

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Encores! Great American Musicals in Concert (Series)

lead_paragraph: Colin Donnell, currently going toe-to-toe with Sutton Foster as her dapper leading man in "Anything Goes,'' will play the ambitious songwriter Franklin Shepard in the Encores! production of "Merrily We Roll Along,'' the show's creative team announced on Tuesday.

headline.main: Hey, Old Friends: Casting Announced for 'Merrily We Roll Along' at Encores!
